The cocktail I drink is reasonable, but the amount is very small.
I will never go back, of course I don't recommend this place.

Original: 我們一群人（英國人、法國人、台灣人、馬來西亞人和越南人）於 2020 年 2 月 28 日來這裡喝一杯慶祝節日。一走進去，客戶服務就很糟糕，沒有人向我們打招呼，我們不得不自己要一張桌子……那裡工作的人坐下來喝酒，盯著我們看，就像我們剛剛裸體走進來一樣。他們讓我們坐在樓上，那裡正在沸騰，並給我們留下了菜單，然後“女服務員”回到樓下享受自己，並告訴我們在酒吧點菜。如果你想要半瓶琴酒和補品，飲料的價格是合理的。仍然感到震驚的是，由於我們沒有收到任何服務，因此添加了服務費。除了離開之外，最好的一點是廁所很乾淨。如果您想在市中心附近喝一杯，那麼乘坐地鐵到 SYS 紀念館並在 Stomach Bar、Mr Bean、Beau 或 Motown 喝一杯是值得的。這個地方太棒了。
EN: A group of us (British, French, Taiwanese, Malaysians and Vietnamese) came here to celebrate a festival on February 28, 2020.As soon as I walked in, the customer service was very bad. No one greets us. We had to ask for a table ourselves ... The people who worked there sat down to drink, staring at us, just like we just came in naked.They asked us to sit upstairs, there were boiling, leaving us the menu, and then the "female waiter" returned to the downstairs to enjoy ourselves, and told us to order in a bar.If you want half a bottle of piano wine and supplements, the price of the drink is reasonable.What is still shocked is that because we did not receive any services, we added service fees.In addition to leaving, the best point is that the toilet is very clean.If you want to drink a cup near the city center, take a subway to the SYS Memorial and drink a cup at Stomach Bar, MR Bean, Beau or Motown.This place is great.
